tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES
comments: Taking this class i was unsure whether or not id pass but she has a good way of teaching as long as you keep up you\'ll be fine.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Super Easy Class. Just Attend Class Every Single Day And You Will Be Fine. Very Easy And Not Too Hard.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This class is okay. It can get boring sometimes. You\'ll need 3 books for this class (Workbook, Charters book & textbook).She gives out about 12 quizzes through out the semester & drops 2 of the lowest scores. 5 exams & offers about 2 extra credits.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Lots of quizzes. The hmwk assignments are long. I don\'t call her type of teaching, "teaching" at all. She doesn\'t explain things thoroughly. Perhaps an online class is better. However, she can be lenient on certain things. You\'ll just have to talk to her. Main projects: PowerPoints, 1000 word essay, and video. There are oral tests too.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She is very nice and willing to help you. Her tests come straight out from the homework sheets. You will have to complete a Powerpoint of the 5 lessons you will be taught, do a group video, and a three page essay. She makes you interact with your classmates with lot of role playing which makes Chinese fun.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: A very nice teacher and very helpful. Very fun if you get to know her. Some of her assignments seem meaningless, but it\'s very easy to get a good grade.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Participation matters (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Class was okay. She is somewhat unorganized which I did not really like. As long as you keep up with the work that is assigned and review the material this class will be pretty easy. Not a hard class, just very confusing because she\'s not the most organized teacher.
